name: Eddie Galaxy
description:
As Eddie Galaxy, your job is to exterminate huge monster insects all across the universe.  Blast through ten planets, with 50 levels of action, including bonus rounds in outer space between each planet.  You'll have to collect Power-Ups by completing Special Missions in order to survive!  This is one tough arcade game!

* 50 levels of arcade action, spread across 10 unique worlds.

* The 'Special Mission' system makes you work for your power-ups!  Complete tasks like a Scavenger Hunt or destroying 3 Cacti before time runs out.

* Bonus levels between each world offer different kinds of gameplay, from dodging asteroids to defeating the evil Galactic Horde.
